detail_desc: Top in soft jersey made from a linen and viscose blend with a V-neck, short sleeves and ties at the front of the hem.
Jumper in a soft, loose knit with low dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Longer at the back.
Short dress in stretch jersey with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the top, a seam with a tie belt at the waist and long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. Partly lined.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in crinkled jersey with a lace detail at the front and elastication with a decorative drawstring around the top. Short sleeves with a pompom trim.

Set with a top and pair of leggings in soft organic cotton. Top in sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and a decorative tie detail at the hem. Soft brushed inside. Leggings in stretch jersey with an elasticated waist and print stripes down the sides of the legs.
Metal hair clip decorated with pearly plastic beads. Length 8 cm.
Knitted mittens with pompoms and an embroidered motif and a front flap that can be fastened back to reveal a pair of fingerless gloves. Ribbed, foldover cuffs.

Short-sleeved shirt in a stretch cotton weave with a narrow turn-down collar with a contrasting colour trim, French front, yoke and darts at the back, and a rounded hem. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s physique with narrow shoulders, tapered sleeves and an accentuated waist to create a flattering silhouette.
Set with a dress and pair of leggings in soft organic cotton jersey. Short-sleeved dress with a gathered seam at the top and gently flared skirt. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Off-the-shoulder top in a soft viscose blend with narrow shoulder straps and short sleeves. Flounce at the top and an elasticated hem.
Zip-through hoodie in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Mittens in a soft, fine knit with ribbed cuffs. Fleece lining.
Wide, high-waisted trousers in washed denim with a tie belt at the waist and a zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets, back pockets and wide legs with wide turn-ups at the hems.
Trainers with a padded top edge and lacing at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Short jumper in a soft, fluffy knit with dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.

Long, wide dress in airy, crinkled chiffon with ties at the neck and a V-shaped opening at the front. Dropped shoulders and long balloon sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. Seam at the hips and at the knees. Lined with a detachable V-neck underdress in jersey. The underdress has narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. The polyester content of the outer fabric of the dress is partly recycled. The polyester content of the underdress is recycled.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves,a chest pocket and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Trainers in leather with suede details, open lacing and a lightly padded edge and tongue. Leather linings and insoles and slightly higher, textured soles.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with flounce-trimmed cut-out sections at the shoulders.
Pull-on trousers in stretch cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and fake back pockets. Tapered legs with gathers below the knees and a zip at the hems.
Long dress in viscose jersey with a lace bodice. Wide neckline with a V-neck at the back, short cap sleeves and a concealed zip at the back.
Cardigan in a soft knit with a shawl collar, dropped shoulders and no buttons.

Long dress in viscose twill with a grandad collar and button placket. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and wide, buttoned cuffs. Seam at the hips and a flared skirt that is slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jeans in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, fake fly with a press-stud, fake front pockets and real back pockets. Slim legs with narrow hems.
Sports shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, ventilating sections at the sides and soft inner shorts with a key pocket.
Fitted top in ribbed cotton jersey with a polo neck and long sleeves.
Vest tops in soft, stretch cotton jersey.
Long-sleeved tops in soft jersey with a round neck and long sleeves. The cotton content of the tops is organic.
Ankle boots in imitation leather with open sections at the sides and metal studs along the edges. Fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel approx. 5.5 cm.
Soft cotton twill trousers in a relaxed fit. High, frill-trimmed paper bag waist with covered elastication, a zip fly and press-studs, side and back pockets, and tapered legs.

Dungaree shorts in stretch denim made from a cotton blend with hard-worn details and adjustable straps with a metal fastener. Chest pocket, front and back pockets and a seam at the waist with loops and metal press-studs. Fake fly and raw-edge, frayed hems. The cotton content of the garment is partly recycled.

Top in soft viscose jersey with a unique nursing feature. The top has a round neck and short sleeves. The design includes a double layer at the top to help you keep warm while allowing easy access to the bust for nursing.
Round-necked T-shirts in soft jersey.
Fine-knit jumper in soft cotton. Hood with a wrapover front and decorative drawstring, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Shirt in a patterned cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke at the back. Chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Suit trousers in woven fabric with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, jetted back pockets and legs with creases. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Socks in a fine-knit cotton blend with a ribbed shaft.
Mules in a cotton weave with a frill at the front. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 1.5 cm.
Lace bra with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide extra-firm support. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Calf-length dress in a viscose weave with a collar, concealed buttons down the front, long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs and a detachable belt with metal D-rings. Unlined.

Slightly longer blouse in woven fabric with a grandad collar, buttons down the front and decorative gathers at the shoulders. Yoke with a pleat at the back for added width and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Trousers in woven fabric with a high paper bag waist, side pockets, detachable tie belt and tapered legs.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft jersey.
Jumper in a soft knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved top in soft viscose jersey with a print motif on the front and tie detail at the hem.

Fully lined sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric. Lightly padded cups with removable inserts, adjustable shoulder straps and a racer back. Light support. The bra is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Long-sleeved top in a linen weave with a V-neck. Slightly longer at the back.
Shirt in a soft viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front and 3/4-length sleeves with elastication and a flounce at the cuffs.

Shirt in premium cotton with a cutaway collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Varying pattern on the inside of the cuffs and collar stand. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Satin shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and frill-trimmed hems.
Double-layered hat in a soft rib knit with a sewn-in turn-up at the hem with a small fabric appliqué on the front.
Padded bomber jacket in woven fabric with a small, ribbed stand-up collar and zip down the front. Welt side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Short, wide, off-the-shoulder blouse in lace with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, long sleeves with scalloped trims, and a scalloped hem. Partly lined in jersey.
Jumper in a soft cotton knit with a high, ribbed stand-up collar and zip at the top. Long sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

department_name: Denim wardrobe H&M man inactive from S.6
detail_desc: Single-breasted jacket in a stretch textured weave with narrow notch lapels and two buttons at the front. Chest pocket with a lining that can be used as a decorative handkerchief, welt front pockets and two inner pockets, one with a button. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.
Hipster briefs in microfibre with lace details, a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Cardigan knitted in soft, garter-stitched cotton with buttons down the front and long sleeves.
Leggings in stretch jersey with an elasticated waist.

One-shoulder sports bra in ribbed microfibre with one wide shoulder strap and wide ribbing at the hem. Light support. The bra is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Fitted, double-breasted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, flap front pockets, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
T-shirt in soft organic cotton jersey.
Gently flared, knee-length skirt in a fine-knit viscose blend with a ribbed, elasticated waistband. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey.
Crop tops in soft jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Block-coloured top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Trainers with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Twill cap with an appliqué on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Top in softly draping, ribbed jersey with a sheen. Narrow shoulder straps, a V-neck at the front and a lace trim at the top.

Lightly padded, quilted jacket in woven fabric with a sheen. Detachable, lined hood with a narrow elasticated edge, zip down the front, zipped side pockets and narrow elastication at the cuffs. Lined.

Sleeveless dress in soft, slub cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back. Second layer at the top with a wide lace trim, an elasticated seam at the waist and a scalloped lace trim at the hem.
Fitted tops in soft jersey with short sleeves and gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy. The cotton content of the tops is organic.
Sandals with narrow straps, covered block heels and elasticated ankle straps. Imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 5.5 cm.
Chiffon dress with a wide neckline, small opening and button at the back of the neck, 3/4-length, flounced sleeves, and an elasticated seam at the waist. Lined.

Trousers in woven fabric with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, a zip fly and a hook-and-eye fastening, side pockets and a welt back pocket. Relaxed Fit – a fit with good room for movement creating a comfortable, relaxed silhouette.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and a fake welt back pocket.

Dungarees in soft, stretch denim with press-studs at the sides and straps with adjustable fasteners. Seam and belt loops at the waist, a fake fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and elasticated hems. Press-studs at the crotch and down the legs in sizes 4-12M.
Small suede shoulder bag with a metal chain and suede shoulder strap, flap with a magnetic fastener and a zipped inner compartment. Cotton twill lining. Size 5x13x21 cm.
